The Winter's Tale
College of Further Education, Derby Road, Mansfield Result as shown in British Bandsman 24/02/1979 although seems a little odd that Rivington and Adlington (a village band from Lancashire) should competed in a Nottinghamshire Miners Contest.
May 24, 2014, 12:10 p.m. Dec. 8, 2014, 10:40 p.m.
1 Creswell Colliery Band Mervyn Griffiths
2 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Roy Walters
3 Rivington and Adlington Band Valerie E. Roocroft
